[Didn't manage to post these yesterday.
Also, we didn't get through all the actives because we spent a while on #46518. Next week!]

**2021-09-08 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons, @spf13**

- [#47621](https://golang.org/issue/47621) **bufio: add Reader.DiscardRune(n int)**
  - commented
- [#46731](https://golang.org/issue/46731) **cmd/compile: replace \`//go:notinheap\` with runtime/internal/sys.NotInHeap**
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- [#48157](https://golang.org/issue/48157) **cmd/go: add per-test timeouts**
  - added to minutes
- [#38964](https://golang.org/issue/38964) **cmd/go: configurable extra vcs paths**
  - commented
- [#39426](https://golang.org/issue/39426) **cmd/go: make "go test" exit 0 if \*.go files exist but none match context**
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- [#47822](https://golang.org/issue/47822) **cmd/vet warns when the cutset of strings.{Trim,TrimLeft,TrimRight} is not in order**
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- [#47632](https://golang.org/issue/47632) **container/heap: add Heap, a heap backed by a slice**
  - hold for after Go 1.18
- [#47579](https://golang.org/issue/47579) **fmt: Sprintf-into-bytes**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#47781](https://golang.org/issue/47781) **go/ast, go/token: additions to support type parameters**
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- [#47783](https://golang.org/issue/47783) **go/parser: add a mode flag to disallow the new syntax for type parameters / instantiation**
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- [#47916](https://golang.org/issue/47916) **go/types: additions to support type parameters**
  - commented
- [#46423](https://golang.org/issue/46423) **go/types: change Interface.Embedded to panic instead of returning nil for non-defined types**
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- [#47342](https://golang.org/issue/47342) **hash/maphash: Provide a \`purego\` implementation**
  - commented
- [#47230](https://golang.org/issue/47230) **log: add flag for displaying function name**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#47649](https://golang.org/issue/47649) **maps: new package to provide generic map functions**
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- [#39178](https://golang.org/issue/39178) **net/http: make DNS lookup timeouts return net.DNSError instead of poll.TimeoutError**
  - commented
- [#46001](https://golang.org/issue/46001) **net/http: use nontransitional IDNA processing**
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- [#46518](https://golang.org/issue/46518) **net/netip: add new IP address package, use in net**
  - commented
- [#42694](https://golang.org/issue/42694) **net: report temporary/deprecated status of addresses in net.Interface**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#47803](https://golang.org/issue/47803) **os: add FS() (filesystem simply using os functions)**
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- [#47209](https://golang.org/issue/47209) **path/filepath: add StopWalk**
  - commented
  - cc’ed owners
- [#47658](https://golang.org/issue/47658) **reflect: add Value.CanInt, CanUint, CanFloat**
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- [#48218](https://golang.org/issue/48218) **reflect: provide a variant of FieldByIndex that does not panic**
  - added to minutes
- [#47216](https://golang.org/issue/47216) **runtime/metrics: additional metrics**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#47619](https://golang.org/issue/47619) **sort: generic functions**
  - commented
- [#33232](https://golang.org/issue/33232) **spec: allow 'any' for 'interface{}' in non-constraint contexts**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#47487](https://golang.org/issue/47487) **spec: allow explicit conversion from function to 1-method interface**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#46477](https://golang.org/issue/46477) **spec: generics: type parameters on aliases**
  - commented
- [#45003](https://golang.org/issue/45003) **strings: add ReplaceBetween function**
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- [#47657](https://golang.org/issue/47657) **sync, sync/atomic: add PoolOf, MapOf, ValueOf**
  - discussion ongoing
- [#47663](https://golang.org/issue/47663) **text/template: struct tags**
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- [#47510](https://golang.org/issue/47510) **x/net/idna: add pre-defined profile for non-transitional IDNA2008**
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
